Back to György Ligeti

György Ligeti

Musica ricercata

1951–1953

[Wikipedia]

Total duration: 25' 30"

  • 1.
  • 2.
  • 3.
  • 4.
  • 5.
  • 6.
  • 7.
  • 8.
  • 9. Béla Bartók in memoriam
  • 10.
  • 11. Omaggio a Girolamo Fescobaldi

In 1953, Ligeti made arrangements of selected pieces (nos. 3, 5, 7, 8, 9 and 10) as the Six Bagatelles for wind quintet, and an arrangement of the final piece as the Ricercare for organ. The theme of the third piece was also used in the first movement of the 1950 sonatina for piano duet.

Recommended editions

  • Schott · ED 7718
